verbs.description: [ARG1: annual uc irvine concert] [V: canceled] [ARGM-TMP: after rapper famous dex] jumped into the audience and students rushed the stage the annual shocktoberfest concert held at uc irvine bren event center to kick off the basketball season was abruptly canceled friday night after rapper famous dex leaped into the audience and students stormed the stage officials said university police on site declared it was a dangerous situation tom vasich a spokesman for the campus said so they turned on the lights and canceled the rest of the show concert goers left the arena in dex students union associated students vice president uc irvine bren event center tom vasich dilraj toor dex one pereira shocktoberfest uci
